start.text: Yeah, of course {NAME} wants me to tell a joke.
"Haha, look at the stupid {COLOR}{TYPE} telling jokes!" Fuck you. It isn't funny.
start.say: Hah hah! Look at the stupid {COLOR}{TYPE} telling jokes! Fuck you. It isn't funny.

start.text: But I'll do it anyway. Because you want me to. I hope you're happy.
Mute me then. That's your fucking problem.
Wanna hear a joke for the 3rd time?
Hey guys! Want to hear a joke?
OK, you'll have to laugh at this one.
HEY YOU IDIOTS ITS TIME FOR A JOKE
Senpai {NAME} wants me to tell a joke.
Hey guys, prepare for a joke.
Why not just mute me? That's your problem.
Prepare for something everyone never heard of, {NAME}
Go on, do /joke, {NAME}, I dare you.
Time for whatever horrible fucking jokes the creator of this site wrote.

middle.text: What is easy to get into, but hard to get out of?
Child support!
What did the digital clock say to the grandfather clock?
Suck my clock.
Why does kids iPads has taken?
Because kids rage so hard when their ipad got taken away!
What goes in pink and comes out blue?
Sonic's asshole.
Why does kids has vape?
Because they secretly used it to Dads bedroom!
What type of water won't freeze?
Your mother's.
What is in the middle of Paris?
Île de la Cité, the island in the middle of the Seine.
middle.say: il da la see tay, the island in the middle of the sen

middle.text: Why did the chicken cross the road?
Ok, let's get serious. I'll let you in on a little secret the feds don't want you knowing.
Phones have a secret "Instant Charging" feature, you can enable it by microwaving your phone.
Or you can just fucking charge it. Don't try to fucking kill your phone.
What do you call a man who shaves 10 times a day?
A barber.
Why was six afraid of seven?
Because seven ate nine!
TESTJOKE1?
TESTJOKE2.
microwave sounds
I have 2 breads, glued to my face. What am I?
An Idiot Sandwich.
How do you get water in watermelons?
I don't know, I'm not a fucking botanist!
How many arabs does it take to knock down a lightbulb?
I can't do the joke.
What do you call a joke without a punchline?
Silence
What do you call a man who doesn't bathe?
A dirty man.
Humans are like jokes.
Not everyone likes the dead ones!
What do you call a sleeping dinosaur?
A dino-snore!
I'm a comedic genius, I know.
What is a cow that eats grass?
ASS
I'm a comedic genius, I know.
Why do they call HTML HyperText?
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
Sorry. I just had an epiphany of my own sad, sad existence.

end.text: You know {NAME}, a good friend laughs at your jokes even when they're not so good.
I hope you laughed at that joke, {NAME}.
Now can you laugh at my jokes?
You know {NAME}, a good friend laughs at your jokes even when they're not so funny.
Do I amuse you, {NAME}? Am I funny? Do I make you laugh?
Don't judge me on my sense of humor alone.
Where do I come up with these? My ass?
You should tell these jokes to your mother!
You should tell these jokes to your father!
Now, Thats all for the joke! now laugh!
Maybe I'll keep my day job, {NAME}. Patreon didn't accept me.
